snippet: Would you participate in the campaign if one of your parents were seeking election to the White House?
abstract: Would you participate in the campaign if one of your parents were seeking election to the White House?
lead_paragraph: Four of Mitt Romney's five sons are actively engaged in helping their father's campaign for the Republican presidential nomination, as are the adult daughters of Jon M. Huntsman Jr. If one of your parents were to run for president, would you work on his or her campaign? Would you want your role to be highly public and visible, or would you prefer to stay behind the scenes?

headline.main: What if Your Parent Ran for President?
